definition: to gather together
penetrating (as of cold)/struggle
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to pile up/to heap up/a mass/pile/heap/stack/large amount

sentences.english: On the other hand, users gather in this community and have fun.
sentences.chinese: 而另一方面，用戶們也快樂的扎堆在這個社區裏。

sentences.english: "Mass strategy" is reflected in the star crowding together.
sentences.chinese: “人海戰術”首先體現在明星扎堆。

area particularly hard-hit by a disaster/disaster area
